decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to assemble a powerful combo using artifacts and creatures to generate a massive amount of mana and overwhelm the opponent with big threats. Cards like Ancient Stirrings and Urza's Saga help to search for key pieces, while Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command provide disruption. The creatures in the deck, such as Glaring Fleshraker and Walking Ballista, can benefit from the artifacts and enchantments by gaining counters or additional abilities. This deck aims to quickly build a dominant board presence and win the game through overwhelming force.

This Control - Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's plans while efficiently dealing with threats using a mixture of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. It prioritizes control of the game through disruption and denial, utilizing a variety of versatile cards such as Counterspell, Fatal Push, and Thought Scour. With a focus on graveyard interaction and card advantage, the deck seeks to outmaneuver the opponent and maintain board control to secure victories through attrition.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on building a quick and aggressive board presence, utilizing powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Amped Raptor. The deck also includes burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge to help control the board and push through damage. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional support and resilience for the creatures in the deck. The inclusion of Static Prison and Arena of Glory helps to disrupt opponents' strategies and protect the aggressive creatures in the deck. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and powerful offense.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The key strategy is to establish a fast board presence with cards like Amped Raptor and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, while utilizing burn spells like Lightning Bolt to clear the way for attacks. The inclusion of companion Jegantha, the Wellspring allows for additional mana ramp and flexibility in deck construction. Overall, the deck prioritizes speed and aggression to pressure the opponent and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing the card Underworld Breach to create a powerful combo by recurring spells and artifacts from the graveyard. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student help to fuel the graveyard with artifacts to be used with Underworld Breach. The goal is to generate enough mana and card advantage to win the game quickly through the combo. The deck also includes disruption with cards like Spell Snare and Unholy Heat to control the board and protect the combo pieces.

The deck focuses on casting powerful spells with alternative costs to disrupt the opponent's game plan and ultimately win through a combo involving Goblin Charbelcher. By utilizing cards like Disrupting Shoal and Pact of Negation, the deck can counter key spells while setting up its own win condition. The deck also includes card draw and tutor effects like Whir of Invention to find the necessary pieces for the combo. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces quickly and efficiently, using a mix of disruption and card advantage to control the game.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan by using counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. By controlling the board and slowing down your opponent's strategy, you can buy time to finish the game with your own win conditions. Utilizing a mix of instant speed removal, card draw, and counter magic, this deck aims to outlast your opponent and overwhelm them with efficient threats. The deck includes powerful creatures like Abhorrent Oculus and Psychic Frog to apply pressure while disrupting your opponent's plans.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It includes a variety of disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional value as a companion. The deck also includes powerful threats like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Dragon's Rage Channeler to close out the game quickly. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's aggressive game plan.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Amulet of Vigor to quickly ramp up mana and play Primeval Titan to search for powerful lands like Vesuva and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. It also includes cards like Lotus Field and Scapeshift to generate massive amounts of mana and deal huge amounts of damage to the opponent. The deck aims to assemble the right combination of lands and cards to overwhelm the opponent with a big combo turn and win the game quickly.
